message.body: Cindy said she should be there around 4. I'll touch base with her in the morning.
Kevin had some questions. I told him to call Cindy/ Beth but I also told him that you or David or Phillip might be able to answer questions as you guys just went thru this.
So I just talked to Cindy. She said she will be there around 4. Will you be home?
Thank you. Any word from Cindy?
OK. I'm going to call her. Can you do me a favor & make sure that Kevin & Phillip's doors are unlocked?
I just called her. She said she would be there in @ half hour. Sorry. It think when she says 4 she means 5ish.
Cindy just called. She said she is stuck in North Philly. Apparently there was a traffic accident that killed a child & she is blocked in by police cars.
No worries I had to leave bc of work
